Reviews.Title: “Smell what you eat”

Reviews.Content: hy stayed lloret 3 nights – 4 days biggest plus location – practically step la rambla catalunya subway station 5 minutes mc burger king carrefour market neighbors hotel people – bed single clean warm hot water running walls thick piece paper – don’t complain breakfast – rich star hotel cereals ham fruits pastry etc – pastry stinky – literally – muffins smelled awful advice smell eating – thumbs location happy holiday
